spearheadEnhancements.name: Regrowth
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Your general channels an invigorating bloom of magic.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick a visible friendly unit wholly within 18" of your general to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Treesong
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Your general implores the spirits of the wyldwoods to guide the blades of their allies.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick a visible friendly unit wholly within 12" of your general to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: On a 7+, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target unit’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Gnarled Warrior
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This Sylvaneth’s battlescarred hide has turned aside countless blades.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Ignore negative modifiers to save rolls for your general.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Seed of Rebirth
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Should its bearer ever fall, the seed will grant them new life.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: If your general would be destroyed, before removing them from play, roll a dice. On a 3+, your general is not destroyed and any remaining damage points inflicted on them have no effect. Then, **Heal (1)** your general. This unit cannot use this ability again for the rest of the battle.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Flask of Shademist
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Filled with an obscuring mist harvested from the Ulguan coast, when this flask is shattered, the battlefield is plunged into darkness.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Until the end of the phase, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly units while they are wholly within 12" of your general.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Fuelled by Revenge
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This general inspires a wrathful lust for vengeance in her Scáthborn kin.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **Blood Stalkers** units while they are wholly within 12" of your general.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Zealous Orator
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Your general is a wild demagogue who inspires her followers to fight on in the face of impossible odds.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick a friendly unit wholly within 9" of your general that is **not** in combat. Roll a dice for each slain model from that unit.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: For each 5+, you can return 1 slain model to that unit.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Bathed in Blood
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Your general draws vigour from the gore that splatters over her in battle.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Each time a model is slain by your general, **Heal (1)** your general.

battleTraits.name: Strike and Fade
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, End of Any Turn
battleTraits.lore: These warriors use the spirit paths to ambush the enemy before retreating back into the shadows.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly unit that used a ****FIGHT**** ability this turn and is within 3" of any terrain features, then roll a dice.
battleTraits.effect: On a 2+, remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again so that each model in the unit is within 3" of any terrain features and more than 6" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Ley Lines
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, End of Any Turn
battleTraits.lore: The Sylvaneth draw strength from natural sites of mystical power.
battleTraits.effect: **Heal (1)** each friendly unit that is within 3" of any terrain features.

battleTraits.name: Endless Growth
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
battleTraits.lore: Flourishing groves underfoot bring a surge of rebirth to the Sylvaneth. Their forms are invigorated with restorative sapwood.
battleTraits.declare: Pick any number of friendly **SYLVANETH** units wholly within 6" of any friendly **Awakened Wyldwoods** to be the targets.

battleTraits.name: Strike and Fade
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
battleTraits.lore: These warriors use the spirit paths to ambush the enemy before retreating back into the shadows.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **SYLVANETH** unit that is in combat and is wholly within 6"of a friendly **Awakened Wyldwood** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: Remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units and wholly within 6" of a different friendly **Awakened Wyldwood**.

battleTraits.name: Walk the Hidden Paths
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
battleTraits.lore: Sylvaneth can draw upon the magic of the Wyldwoods to open hidden passageways across the battlefield.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **SYLVANETH** unit that is not in combat and is wholly within 6" of a friendly **Awakened Wyldwood** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: Remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units and wholly within 6" of a different friendly **Awakened Wyldwood**.

artefactsOfPower.name: Seed of Rebirth
artefactsOfPower.lore: Should its bearer ever fall, the seed’s rejuvenating energies will pour into its host to grant them new life.
artefactsOfPower.effect: If this unit would be destroyed, before removing it from play, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit is not destroyed and any remaining damage points inflicted on it have no effect. Then, **Heal (1)** this unit. This unit cannot use this ability again for the rest of the battle.

artefactsOfPower.name: Greenwood Gladius
artefactsOfPower.lore: This blade strikes with the youthful vigour of springtime.
artefactsOfPower.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

artefactsOfPower.name: Crown of Fell Bowers
artefactsOfPower.lore: Rooted in this elegant circlet, a canopy of spectral branches forms above the foe, rendering them strangely vulnerable to the enchanted weapons of the Sylvaneth.
artefactsOfPower.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Roll a dice. On 3+, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **SYLVANETH** units that target that enemy unit this phase.

heroicTraits.name: Spellsinger
heroicTraits.lore: This hero draws on the magical power of the Awakened Wyldwoods.
heroicTraits.effect:
While this unit is within the combat range of an **Awakened** **Wyldwood**:

If this unit is a ****WIZARD****, add 1 to casting rolls for this unit.

If this unit is not a ****WIZARD****, it has ****WIZARD** (1)** instead.

heroicTraits.name: Warsinger
heroicTraits.lore: This general spurs on Alarielle’s children with stirring songs.
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **SYLVANETH** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Add 2" to the **Move** characteristic of the target for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Radiant Spirit
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL or PRAYER ability
heroicTraits.lore: Shielding emerald energy surrounds this hero like a leafy sanctuary.
heroicTraits.usedBy: This unit if it is wholly within 12" of a friendly **SYLVANETH** unit picked to be the target of that spell or prayer.
heroicTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, ignore the effect of that **spell** or **prayer** on that unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per ****SPELL**** or ****PRAYER**** ability.

regimentAbilities.name: Walkers of the Hidden Paths
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Your Movement Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: These mysterious warriors walk the realmroots.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is within 3" of any terrain features and not in combat.
regimentAbilities.effect: Remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again more than 6" from all enemy units. That unit cannot use ****MOVE**** abilities for the rest of the phase.

regimentAbilities.name: Vengeful Spirits of the Land
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, End of Any Turn
regimentAbilities.lore: The realm-spirits lingering around the ancient sites are roused to wrath and unleashed upon the Sylvaneth’s enemies.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that is contesting an objective and roll a dice.
regimentAbilities.effect: On a 4+, inflict D3 mortal damage on that enemy unit.

regimentOfRenown.name: Endless Wandering
regimentOfRenown.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Hero Phase
regimentOfRenown.lore: The spirits of the Lost-Song Forest are ever in motion, desperately seeking the ancestral harmonies denied to them.
regimentOfRenown.declare: Pick a unit in this Regiment of Renown that is not in combat to use this ability.
regimentOfRenown.effect: That unit can use the ‘Normal **Move**’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

regimentOfRenown.name: Ominous Fog
regimentOfRenown.lore: A thick fog follows the Lost-Song Spirits, making them difficult to identify until it is too late.
regimentOfRenown.effect: Units in this Regiment of Renown are not visible to enemy units more than 12" from them while they are wholly within 9" of the **Treelord** in this Regiment of Renown.

abilities.name: Wrathful Spirits
abilities.lore: The caster implores the simple spirits of the Wyldwoods to guide the blades of their allies and expose the weaknesses of the foe.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SYLVANETH WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a friendly **Awakened Wyldwood** wholly within 18" of the caster to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **SYLVANETH** units while they are wholly within 6" of the target.

abilities.name: The Dwellers Below
abilities.lore: Drawing upon the darkest and most spiteful aspects of nature’s power, the caster summons a seething swarm of tendrils from beneath the ground.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SYLVANETH WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit that is either within 12" of this unit or within 6" of an **Awakened** **Wyldwood** to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target unit.

abilities.name: Treesong
abilities.lore: Sylvaneth wizards have a strong spiritual connection to the wyldwoods and can call forth these eldritch copses at a whim.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SYLVANETH WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: If there are fewer than 3 friendly **Awakened Wyldwoods** on the battlefield, you can set up an **Awakened Wyldwood** wholly within 24" of the caster, more than 3" from all objectives and more than 1" from all enemy units and other terrain features. If there are already 3 friendly **Awakened** **Wyldwoods** on the battlefield, **Heal (3)** each friendly **Awakened Wyldwood**.

abilities.name: Summon Spiteswarm Hive
abilities.lore: The air is filled with the buzzing of a thousand wings as a swarm of iridescent insects bursts from its hive.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Spiteswarm Hive** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **SYLVANETH WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Spiteswarm Hive** wholly within 9" of the caster, visible to them and more than 3" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Summon Vengeful Skullroot
abilities.lore: From the shadows comes a nightmarish form, a huge, black-limbed tree clutching piles of bleached skulls within its tangled roots.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Vengeful Skullroot** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **SYLVANETH WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Vengeful Skullroot** wholly within 9" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Summon Gladewyrm
abilities.lore: The earth splits apart as a sleek, serpentine form heaves itself free, eyes blazing with arcane energies.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Gladewyrm** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **SYLVANETH WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Gladewyrm** wholly within 9" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Healing Song
abilities.lore: The spirit-song surgesthrough the Lords of the Clan like a raging river. As they stride across the battlefield, the Treelords harness that energy to further rejuvenate their forms.
abilities.effect: When using the ‘Endless Growth’ ability, friendly **SYLVANETH MONSTERS** can **Heal (3)** instead of **Heal (D3)**.

abilities.name: The Terror in the Eaves
abilities.lore: The Outcasts are the terrors that lurk in the shadows, the creeping things beneath the forest eaves. When great masses of them surge into battle, it is all the enemy can do to avoid dying of sheer fright.
abilities.effect: Subtract 3 from the control scores of enemy units while they are in combat with friendly **SYLVANETH** units.

abilities.name: Fleet and Swift
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Charge Phase
abilities.lore: The Free Spirits are the instruments of Alarielle’s will, a cadre of elite warriors whose presence hones the Sylvaneth into a weapon of singular purpose that brings swift retribution.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SYLVANETH CAVALRY** unit to use this ability.
abilities.effect: This unit can use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** ability this turn.

abilities.name: Lacerating Strike
abilities.lore: Moving quickly through the undergrowth, the Forest Folk plunge into battle. Attacking from every side, multiple bands of infantry lash their victims to bloody tatters.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **SYLVANETH** non-**KURNOTHI INFANTRY** units that charged in the same turn.
